name: Atari Anniversary Advance
overview: Atari presents 6 of the best arcade games ever made, mega-hits that launched the video game revolution -- Asteroids, Battlezone, Centipede, Missile Command, Super Breakout and Tempest. Each game is reproduced down to the last detail, and each one is just as easy and fun to play. Whether you're a diehard fan or a competitive newcomer, you've got to play the games that started it all!
